metadata.title: CVE-2018-0501 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
The mirror:// method implementation in Advanced Package Tool (APT) 1.6.xbefore 1.6.4 and 1.7.x before 1.7.0~alpha3 mishandles gpg signatureverification for the InRelease file of a fallback mirror, aka mirrorfail.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apt - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
apt-transport-https - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
apt-utils - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
libapt-inst2.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
libapt-pkg5.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.3ubuntu0.1').
